name: Maiden Marketing India Pvt Ltd
description: Provider of a mobile video advertising platform intended to serve the application developers and publishers. The company's platform offers to make free purchases through multiple alternative monetization tools such as watching videos, subscribing to services, installing applications and participation in surveys, enabling clients to get connected with the right audiences.
one_liner: Provider of a mobile video advertising platform intended to serve the application developers and publishers. The company's platform offers to make free purchases through multiple alternative monetization tools such as watching videos, subscribing to services, installing applications and participation in surveys, enabling clients to get connected with the right audiences.
